description: A structured remediation plan for resolving a single infrastructure incident.

summary.description: High-level explanation of the remediation decision, including why a remediation was chosen or why no safe remediation or verification is possible.

steps.description: Ordered remediation actions that mutate system state to resolve the incident. May be empty if no safe remediation can be proposed.

action.description: A single, deterministic Docker CLI command that performs one remediation action.

reason.description: Why this remediation action is necessary and how it contributes to fixing the root cause.

verification.description: Ordered verification checks that prove the incident is resolved. May be empty if safe deterministic verification cannot be performed.

action.description: A single Docker CLI command that verifies functional recovery of the original failure mode.

reason.description: Why this command conclusively verifies that the incident has been resolved.
